measured_by: Tridimensional Personality Questionnaire – Novelty Seeking dimension (TPQ-NS)
justification: Participants "completed the novelty seeking dimension of the Tridimensional personality questionnaire (TPQ-NS) during an online session," indicating this scale operationalised novelty-seeking.
The methods state that subjects completed "the state and trait anxiety questionnaire (STAI-S, STAI-T) in person," specifying STAI-T as the measure of trait anxiety.
The same sentence notes administration of "STAI-S," identifying the STAI state scale as the instrument for state anxiety.
For statistical analyses, "anxiety was calculated by averaging between the trait and state dimensions of the STAI questionnaire," showing the overall anxiety score derived from the STAI.
